I have developed several mobile and desktop app’s including:

Beyond Meditation

An iPhone app developed by my brother Ollie, and I. Beyond Meditation is an elegant brainwave entrainment/binaural beats meditation app which delivers a powerful ten-level progressive meditation program which is beautiful to listen to, ultra-relaxing, blissful and reliably enables deep meditation.

App Store URL

Jelly SMS

Avail of free SMS texts using your mobile operator’s allowances or low-cost international texts using an online provider!

Works on Windows, Linux, Mac desktops as well as on iPhone/iPod Touch/iPad and Android mobile phones.

http://www.jellysms.com

Extra! Extra!

Extra! Extra! brings the front pages of over 800 major newspapers from around the globe to your iPhone, iPod Touch, and iPad every day. I have re-branded the app and it is now the official Newseum.org ‘Todays Front Pages’ app.

App Store URL
